name: Magneton
flavorText:
Formed by several
MAGNEMITEs linked
together. They frequently appear
when sunspots
flare up.

previous.name: Magnemite
previous.flavorText:
Uses anti-gravity
to stay suspended.
Appears without warning and uses
THUNDER WAVE and
similar moves.

next.name: Farfetch’d
next.flavorText:
The sprig of
green onions it
holds is its weapon. It is
used much like a
metal sword.

pokemon.name: Magnezone
pokemon.flavorText:
It evolved from exposure to a
special magnetic field.
Three units generate magnetism.
